org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules
Class LyrMustBeCoveredByOneGeometry

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.topology.AbstractTopologyRule
      org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules.AbstractSpatialPredicateTwoLyrRule
          org.gvsig.topology.topologyrules.LyrMustBeCoveredByOneGeometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPersistence, IOneLyrRule, ITopologyRule, ITwoLyrRule
Direct Known Subclasses:
LyrMustBeContainedByOneGeometry, LyrMustBeCoveredByLyr
public class LyrMustBeCoveredByOneGeometry
extends AbstractSpatialPredicateTwoLyrRule

All feature geometries of origin layer must be covered by one only element of destination layer. Covers spatial predicate is least exclusive than contains.
Use spatial rule LyrMustBeContained if dont want to allow covers relationships. (for example, a linestring in a polygon boundary)

Author:
Alvaro Zabala
